name: PASKA BATTLE STYLE!
description:
The time has finally come! All the most dangerous people in the world have reunited to show off their talents in the annual Paska Battle Style anniversary and you, yes, YOU, will have to shut their big egos off!

Play in this super challenging fps boss rush against the 9 (wait, only 9? something's off...) greatest robot pilots to have ever stepped foot in this green beautiful earth! But be careful because they won't just let you humiliate them like nothing, these people didn't gain their accolades by luck!
